question: Where is the “Network of Central Banks and Supervisors for Greening the Financial System (NGFS)” head quartered?
explanation:
The US Federal Reserve has recently joined the Network of Central Banks and Supervisors for Greening the Financial System (NGFS). 
NGFS is an international group of central banks of various countries, that has a special focus on climate change risks. It is headquartered at Paris, France.
